      • setEnabled

        public static void setEnabled(android.app.Activity activity,
                              boolean notificationEnabled)
        Enables/Disables the application to receive notification ads
        Parameters:
        activity - an activity
        notificationEnabled - The flag to enable/disable the notification ads.

      • setAdRequest

        public static void setAdRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                NotificationAdRequest request)
        Sets the notification ad request parameters
        Parameters:
        context - an android context
        request - a NotificationAdRequest with the custom parameters on the notification request builder

      • isEnabled

        public static boolean isEnabled(android.content.Context context)

      • getById

        public static com.inlocomedia.android.ads.notification.NotificationAdResponse getById(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                      java.lang.String id)
        Shows a notification ad, given the id corresponding to that ad.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        id - The identification of the ad to be shown
        Returns:
        If the InLoco Location SDK is available, the notification ad corresponding to the id. Else, returns null;

      • showById

        public static void showById(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String id)
        Shows a notification ad, given the corresponding id.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        id - The identification of the ad to be shown

      • discardById

        public static boolean discardById(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String id)
        Discards a notification ad, given the id corresponding to that ad.
        Parameters:
        context - An Android context
        id - The identification of the ad to be shown
        Returns:
        Whether the ad was discarded successfully or not (if the InLoco Location SDK is not available, returns false)
